transcript.text:
￼














Products


Product Actions
Metatag

3 min
purpose the metatags are the snippets that describe a page they are only visible to search engines these tags and titles will help your product page rank higher in search engine results from this tab, you can provide metadata for the selected products to improve their rankings in the search engine results it is recommended that you contact an seo expert and take advice on the same configuration enter seo friendly content such as page titles, keywords, and descriptions if you have multiple languages enabled, then enter the translated content for each page product sections select the product section to add the metatag page title define the page title for your product this title is displayed when a customer hovers over the title bar meta description this is the meta description briefly describing the page and its content this description severely affects the search engine rankings of your product canonical reference provide a reference of canonical in case any similar product exists with a similar url know more from the ‘?’ icon on admin panel this will save you from the duplicity of the content additional schema markup schema markup is a structured data vocabulary that helps search engines better understand the info on your website to serve rich results here, using the help provided add schema for various pages additional meta tag add additional metatag for the selected product to be used in the search engine optimization know more from the ‘?’ icon
Did this page help you?
